name: Car Doge game or something.
description:
First of all, this game is not complete. The UI is not great, i know. Also i don't know what to name this game. That's why it is in early access. You might me thinking what a messy developer. But i am 13 years old, so spare me. This game has completely been made by me. So if you just play it I will be thankful. I have just started out. Thanks for your time and i am sure that this game will be relaxing and fun for you. 

Minimum Requirements

i3

4gb ram

any intel graphics card

Please leave a comment suggesting about how i can improve and how you liked it.
